Classes in niagara.optimizer.rules used by niagara.optimizer.rules
Antecedent
          Antecedent patterns for ConstructedRules.
AssociateJoinRtoL
          Join associativity, right to left: A x (B x C) -> (A x B) x C
CommuteJoin
          Commute a remote subplan on the left ith a local subplan on the right
Consequent
          Consequent patterns for ConstructedRules.
ConstructedRule
          Constructed rules are rules constructed at run time from an XML specification (but can have more complex before and after patterns than SimpleRule allows).
CustomRule
          Custom rules can be customized in a limited way from the catalog.
ParsedRule
          A simple rule which maps (exactly) one logical operator to one initializable operator.
Pattern
           
SimpleRule
          A simple rule which maps (exactly) one logical operator to one initializable operator.
